    • Method Detail

      • drawBoard

        public static java.lang.String drawBoard(java.lang.String quote,
                                         java.util.Set<java.lang.String> letters,
                                         java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> players)
        Draws a leader board for the Wheel of Fortune game in ASCII art
        Parameters:
        quote - a String that represents the quote to display
        letters - a Set of individual strings that were already picked by the players
        players - A List> of 3 players and their score. Example n json [{player1Name,player1Score},{player2Name,player2Score},{player3Name,player3Score}]
        Returns:
        A String with the drawn board
